title: VTech KidiZoom Smartwatch DX3 (Black)
features: Cool, kid-friendly DX3 features dual cameras for photos and videos; watch light is camera flash or flashlight
Create clockfaces from your photos or choose from 50+ animated faces; switch to School mode to use the DX3 as watch only
Pair with another DX3 and share preset messages or play games, or play solo; challenge yourself with three movement games

description: The coolest smartwatch brand is hereâ€”the VTech KidiZoom Smartwatch DX3 Black. The kid-friendly DX3 features dual cameras for pictures, selfies and videos along with one- and two-player games, daily reminders and more. Cool, kid-friendly DX3 features dual cameras for photos and videos; watch light is camera flash or flashlight. Create clockfaces from your photos or choose from 50+ animated faces; switch to School mode to use the DX3 as watch only. Pair with another DX3 and share preset messages or play games, or play solo; challenge yourself with three movement games. Download more games, clockfaces and camera effects from Learning Lodge; when you're done the watch box is also a case. Intended for ages 4+ years; charge device using included Micro-USB cable only and not a third-party adapter. Smartwatch comes with camera, games, School mode and more; makes a terrific birthday present or holiday gift for the kids in your life.
